options.text: If managing the resources through a private hybrid connection then leave the following options set to no, otherwise connectivity to the resources will need to take place over the internet securely hence, Azure Bastion should be used.

elements.name: azureBastionDeploy
elements.label: Deploy Azure Bastion
elements.toolTip: Selecting 'Yes' will deploy Azure Bastion within the virtual network to securely connect to the Riverbed resources.

elements.name: bastionName
elements.label: Azure Bastion Hostname
elements.toolTip: Enter a name for the Azure Bastion resource.

validations.message: Only 1-80 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and periods are allowed.

elements.name: jumpboxDeploy
elements.label: Deploy Jumpbox
elements.toolTip: Selecting 'Yes' will deploy a jumpbox or management VM within the virtual network.

elements.name: jumpboxOS
elements.label: Windows OS Version
elements.toolTip: Select the Windows Operating System version for the Jumpbox.

elements.name: jumpboxSize
elements.label: Size
elements.toolTip: Selecting a size for the virtual machine.

elements.name: jumpboxName
elements.label: Jumpbox Hostname
elements.toolTip: Enter a hostname for the Jumpbox.

validations.message: Only 1-15 alphanumeric characters are allowed.

elements.name: jumpboxAdmin
elements.label: Jumpbox Admin Username
elements.toolTip: Enter an admin username for use with the virtual machine.

validations.message: Only 1-64 alphanumeric characters are allowed.

toolTip.password: Enter a password for the admin user.

constraints.customValidationMessage: The password must be alphanumeric, contain at least 12 characters, and have at least 1 letter and 1 number.

options.text: This template will deploy a virtual network with subnets and associated network security groups. If Azure Bastion was selected in the management tab then an additional subnet required for Azure Bastion will also be deployed with configurable options below.

elements.name: virtualNetworkName
elements.toolTip: Enter a name for the Virtual Network.
elements.label: Virtual Network Name

validations.message: Only 2-64 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and periods are allowed.

elements.name: virtualNetworkAddress
elements.label: Virtual Network Address Prefix
elements.toolTip: Enter a network address such as 10.0.0.0/24 for the Virtual Network.

validations.message: Enter a network address such as 10.0.0.0/24

elements.name: subnetGeneralName
elements.label: General Subnet Name
elements.toolTip: Enter a name for the general subnet.

validations.message: Only 1-80 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and periods are allowed.

elements.name: subnetGeneralAddress
elements.label: General Subnet Address Prefix
elements.toolTip: Enter a network address such as 10.0.0.0/24 for the general subnet.

validations.message: Enter a network address such as 10.0.0.0/24

elements.name: subnetInboundName
elements.label: Inbound Subnet Name
elements.toolTip: Enter a name for the inbound subnet.

validations.message: Only 1-80 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and periods are allowed.

elements.name: subnetInboundAddress
elements.label: Inbound Subnet Address Prefix
elements.toolTip: Enter a network address such as 10.0.0.0/24 for the inbound subnet.

validations.message: Enter a network address such as 10.0.0.0/24

elements.name: subnetOutboundName
elements.label: Outbound Subnet Name
elements.toolTip: Enter a name for the outbound subnet.

validations.message: Only 1-80 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and periods are allowed.

elements.name: subnetOutboundAddress
elements.label: Outbound Subnet Address Prefix
elements.toolTip: Enter a network address such as 10.0.0.0/24 for the outbound subnet.

validations.message: Enter a network address such as 10.0.0.0/24

elements.name: azureBastionAddress
elements.label: Azure Bastion Subnet Address Prefix
elements.toolTip: Enter a network address such as 10.0.0.0/24 for the Azure Bastion subnet.

validations.message: Enter a network address such as 10.0.0.0/24

elements.name: nsgName
elements.label: Network Security Group Name
elements.toolTip: Enter a name for the Network Security Group

validations.message: Only 1-80 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and periods are allowed.

elements.name: asgName
elements.label: Application Security Group Name
elements.toolTip: Enter a name for the Application Security Group.

validations.message: Only 1-80 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and periods are allowed.

elements.name: allowedSourceIpToMgmt
elements.label: Networks permitted to manage resources
elements.toolTip: Enter network addresses separated by commas that are permitted to manage resources in this deployment.

validations.message: Only 10-60 numeric characters, periods, spaces and forward slashes are allowed.

options.text: This template will deploy two Riverbed appliances as virtual machines; Net Profiler and Flow Gateway.

elements.name: rvbdNetProfilerSize
elements.label: Size
elements.toolTip: Select a size for the Riverbed Net Profiler virtual machine.

elements.name: rvbdNetProfilerName
elements.label: Riverbed Net Profiler Hostname
elements.toolTip: Enter a host name for the Net Profiler virtual machine.

validations.message: Only 1-64 alphanumeric characters are allowed.

elements.name: rvbdNetProfilerAdmin
elements.label: Net Profiler Admin Username
elements.toolTip: Enter an admin username for the Net Profiler virtual machine.

validations.message: Only 1-64 alphanumeric characters are allowed.

toolTip.password: Enter a password for the admin user account.

constraints.customValidationMessage: The password must be alphanumeric, contain at least 12 characters, and have at least 1 letter and 1 number.

elements.name: rvbdFlowGatewaySize
elements.label: Size
elements.toolTip: Select a size for the Riverbed Flow Gateway virtual machine.

elements.name: rvbdFlowGatewayName
elements.label: Riverbed Flow Gateway Hostname
elements.toolTip: Enter a hostname for the Riverbed Flow Gateway virtual machine.

validations.message: Only 1-64 alphanumeric characters are allowed.

elements.name: rvbdFlowGatewayAdmin
elements.label: Flow Gateway Admin Username
elements.toolTip: Enter an admin username for the virtual machine.

validations.message: Only 1-64 alphanumeric characters are allowed.

toolTip.password: Enter a password for the admin username.

constraints.customValidationMessage: The password must be alphanumeric, contain at least 12 characters, and have at least 1 letter and 1 number.

elements.name: appServicePlanName
elements.label: Application Service Plan Name
elements.toolTip: Enter a name for the Application Service Plan.

validations.message: Only 1-80 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and periods are allowed.

elements.name: siteName
elements.label: Azure Function Site Name
elements.toolTip: Enter a globally unique name for the Azure Function web site.

validations.message: Only 1-80 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, and underscores are allowed. The name must be globally unique

elements.name: functionStorageAccountName
elements.label: Azure Function Storage Account Name Prefix
elements.toolTip: Enter a globally unique name for the Storage Account.

validations.message: Only 1-11 lower characters alphanumeric characters. A unique string will be appended to the name you provide to assure the name is globally unique

elements.name: nsgFlowLogName
elements.label: NSG Flow Logs Name
elements.toolTip: Enter a name for the NSG Flow Logs resource.

validations.message: Only 2-80 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, and underscores are allowed.

elements.name: nsgFlowLogStorageAccount
elements.label: NSG Flow Log Storage Account
elements.toolTip: Selecting 'New' will deploy a new storage account for NSG Flow Logs. Selecting 'Existing' will display fields for using an existing storage account.

elements.name: newNsgFlowLogStorageAccount
elements.label: New Flow Logs Storage Account Configuration

elements.name: newNsgFlowLogStorageAccountName
elements.label: New Storage Account Name Prefix
elements.toolTip: Enter between 1 and 5 characters to be used a prefix for the storage account name. The region and a unique string will append the prefix to create a globally unique name.

validations.message: Only 1-5 lower case alphanumeric characters are allowed.

elements.name: existingNsgFlowLogStorageAccount
elements.label: Existing Flow Logs Storage Account Configuration

elements.name: existingNsgFlowLogStorageAccountName
elements.label: Existing Storage Account Name
elements.toolTip: Enter the name for the existing Storage Account to be used with the NSG Flow Logs.

validations.message: Only 3-24 lower case alphanumeric characters are allowed.

elements.name: existingStorageAccountResourceGroupName
elements.label: Existing Storage Account Resource Group
elements.toolTip: Enter the Resource Group name that the existing Storage Account is in.

validations.message: Only 1-90 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, and underscores are allowed. The name must be globally unique
